20110127023336.000|20110127023336.000|CC1| AND THEN, IN ONE BLINDING BLINK
20110127023336.000|20110127023339.000|CC1|            OF AN EYE,          
20110127023339.000|20110127023342.000|CC1|  THEIR TREE HAD GIVEN ITS LAST.
20110127023342.000|20110127023342.000|CC1|   BUT WITH THEIR RAYMOND JAMES 
20110127023342.000|20110127023344.000|CC1|        FINANCIAL ADVISOR,

20110127023347.000|20110127023348.000|CC1|               ? ?
